other_tests.procedure_name: CT abdomen and pelvis with contrast
other_tests.findings: A large right hepatic lobe mass increased in size, measuring 8.4 x 6.7 cm compared with 6.4 x 4.6 cm previously, and a previously seen right hepatic lobe mass increased in size, measuring 2.1 x 2.0 cm compared with 1.4 x 1.0 cm previously. New focal lesions in the right hepatic lobe and caudate lobe measuring 1.8 x 1.6 cm and 2.0 x 2.4 cm were noted. Mild intrahepatic biliary dilatation and pneumobilia mainly in the left lobe were similar to prior.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Interval progression of hepatic metastatic disease and new lung nodule compared to prior study.

other_tests.findings: Pneumobilia, no CBD dilation, persistent pancreatic duct dilation.
